column7: Typo – Please note that this is a "print change" according to the sense intended.

column6: Please DELETE the second redundant listing of this Headword in the Hierarchy. Since the Window Display is identical in both cases, there is no point in listing this Headword a second time. It is important to note that this Headword is only printed a single time in Devanāgarī script. Therefore, it must appear only once in the Hierarchy Alphabetical Display List. MW, APTE and Shabda seem to agree.
